snippet: With warm weather comes a phenomenon that is centuries old: the burglar who breaks in upper-floor apartments through open windows.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column; warm weather in New York City brings the return of thieves who take advantage of windows left open in the summer heat.
lead_paragraph: With warm weather comes a phenomenon that is centuries old: the burglar who breaks in upper-floor apartments through open windows.

headline.seo: Season of Open Windows, and the Second-Story Man
headline.main: A Season of Open Windows, and the Second-Story Man
headline.print_headline: The Season of Open Windows, and the Second-Story Man
